detailed_summary:
**ELLAH LAKES PLC - Management Accounts Summary for 6 Months Ended January 31, 2016**

**Financial Overview:**
- **Period:** 6 months ended January 31, 2016
- **Currency:** Nigerian Naira (N)

**Statement of Financial Position:**
- **Total Assets:** N1,183,239,722 (as of January 31, 2016) vs. N1,180,871,155 (as of July 31, 2015)
  - **Non-Current Assets:** N1,137,549,604 (Jan 31, 2016) vs. N1,136,456,711 (July 31, 2015)
    - **Biological Assets:** N50,037,179 (Jan 31, 2016) vs. N43,004,413 (July 31, 2015)
    - **Property, Plant & Equipment:** N1,087,512,425 (Jan 31, 2016) vs. N1,093,452,298 (July 31, 2015)
  - **Current Assets:** N45,690,118 (Jan 31, 2016) vs. N44,414,444 (July 31, 2015)
    - **Cash & Cash Equivalents:** N7,294,728 (Jan 31, 2016) vs. N14,352,314 (July 31, 2015)

- **Total Liabilities:** N710,787,793 (Jan 31, 2016) vs. N710,787,793 (July 31, 2015)
  - **Non-Current Liabilities:** N646,430,530 (Jan 31, 2016) vs. N634,635,176 (July 31, 2015)
  - **Current Liabilities:** N60,000,000 (Jan 31, 2016) vs. N60,000,000 (July 31, 2015)

- **Total Equity:** N532,961,651 (Jan 31, 2016) vs. N542,388,438 (July 31, 2015)
  - **Share Capital:** N60,000,000 (both periods)
  - **Retained Earnings:** N-237,826,142 (Jan 31, 2016) vs. N-228,399,355 (July 31, 2015)

**Statement of Comprehensive Income:**
- **Sales Revenue:** N28,906,790 (Jan 31, 2016) vs. N21,824,805 (Jan 31, 2015)
- **Cost of Sales:** N17,221,882 (Jan 31, 2016) vs. N10,289,395 (Jan 31, 2015)
- **Gross Profit:** N11,684,908 (Jan 31, 2016) vs. N11,535,410 (Jan 31, 2015)
- **Operating Expenses:** N21,111,695 (Jan 31, 2016) vs. N18,469,105 (Jan 31, 2015)
- **Profit/(Loss) Before Taxation:** N-9,426,787 (Jan 31, 2016) vs. N-6,933,695 (Jan 31, 2015)
- **Net Profit/(Loss):** N-9,426,787 (Jan 31, 2016) vs. N-6,933,695 (Jan 31, 2015)
- **Earnings Per Share (EPS):** N-0.157 (Jan 31, 2016) vs. N-0.116 (Jan 31, 2015)

**Statement of Cash Flows:**
- **Cash and Cash Equivalents at Beginning of Period:** N10,666,373 (Jan 31, 2016)
- **Cash and Cash Equivalents at End of Period:** N7,294,728 (Jan 31, 2016)
- **Net Cash Outflow from Investment Activities:** N-3,371,645 (Jan 31, 2016)
- **Net Cash Inflow from Operating Activities:** N7,294,728 (Jan 31, 2016)

**Key Notes:**
- The financial statements were prepared in accordance with IAS 34 interim financial reporting.
- The interim financial statements were authorized for issue by the Board of Directors on February 28, 2016.
- No dividends were declared during the period.

This summary encapsulates the key financial figures and performance metrics for Ellah Lakes PLC for the specified period, providing a comprehensive overview of the company's financial health.
